text: Annu Good Friday is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Beypore Mani, starring Lalu Alex and Shari in lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/annu- good-friday-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Lalu Alex * Mala Aravindan * Shari * VK Sreeraman ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
